properties.headline: TYPO3 Phoenix Hatched
properties.text:
The fact that you can read these lines means that TYPO3 Phoenix is able to render content. This page was automatically created by our demo setup controller.

There is even another page which demonstrates that support for sub pages is also implemented already.

properties.headline: TypoScript
properties.text: There's a TypoScript template which renders this page, check it out at Resources/Private/TypoScripts/homepage/Root.ts2 in the PhoenixDemoTypo3Org package.

properties.headline: Content
properties.text: The content for this site was created by importing the XML file found at Resources/Private/Content/Content.xmlin the PhoenixDemoTypo3Org package.
